name: Mohammed Alshareef
skills_sentences: Implementation of security policies and procedures
IBM QRadar security information and event management
Incident escalation to higher support levels
Real-time security event monitoring and detection
Regulatory compliance with National Cybersecurity Authority Essential Cybersecurity Controls
Security event log analysis and correlation
Self-development and fast learning in cybersecurity
responsibility_sentences: Analyzed and investigated suspicious activities and correlated event logs
Enforced security policies in accordance with National Cybersecurity Authority Essential Cybersecurity Controls
Escalated unresolved security problems to higher support levels
Implemented security awareness presentations to enhance organizational security posture
Maintained compliance with ISO 27001 and Aramco Cybersecurity Controls
Monitored inbound and outbound emails for security threats
Performed real-time monitoring, detection, and analysis of security events
Secured devices from malware and cyber threats using endpoint protection systems
Updated six security policies to safeguard sensitive data and ensure regulatory compliance
